sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Nike topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.7%.
Year to date, Nike registers a 3.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Goldman Sachs Group, trading down 0.6%.
Goldman Sachs Group is lower by about 10.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot, trading down 0.4%, and Coca-Cola, trading up 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
